title: White (Roberto)
body: An English subject who resided in Madeira for several years and wrote an interesting and valuable work in 1851 entitled *Madeira, its climate and scenery*. In 1850 and 1851, he made meteorological observations in Funchal and Machico. In 1857, still during White's lifetime, a second edition of his work was published, edited and expanded by James Yate Johnson (see this name).

1851: Publication of the work *Madeira, its climate and scenery*
1857: Publication of the second edition of the work
